description: Are you looking for a healthy alternative to your standard sugary summer cocktail? Look no further than the Sweeter Than Sugarless Mojito. This cooling mix of 80-proof rum and club soda comes with a handful of shredded mint leaves and lime, providing a healthy amount of vitamin C.Plus, the mint leaves give this drink a cooling effect that makes it perfect for sipping on a hot summer day. So next time you're looking for a healthy way to beat the heat, reach for a Sweeter Than Sugarless Mojito. Cheers!
keywords: How To Sweeter Than Sugarless Mojito
Sweeter Than Sugarless Mojito Cocktail Recipe
name: Sweeter Than Sugarless Mojito

recipeInstructions.name: Using a tall glass, pour your desired rum.

recipeInstructions.name: Shred and break mint leaves before combining with rum.
recipeInstructions.text: Shred and break mint leaves before combining with rum.

recipeInstructions.name: Juice half of the lime into the beverage.
recipeInstructions.text: Juice half of the lime into the beverage.

recipeInstructions.name: Top with ice, fill with club soda, and add a sprig of mint.
